name: api_video_VideoClip
description: A container for video assets that can be used in the Vide.VideoPlayer component.

properties.name: audioTrackCount
properties.description: Gets the number of audio tracks that are embedded in the video clip. (Read Only).

properties.name: frameCount
properties.description: The length of the video clip in frames. (Read Only).

properties.name: frameRate
properties.description: The frame rate of the clip in frames per second. (Read Only).

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the images in the video clip in pixels. (Read Only).

properties.name: length
properties.description: The length of the video clip in seconds. (Read Only).

properties.name: originalPath
properties.description: Gets the original video clip file path as it was imported into Unity. (Read Only).

properties.name: pixelAspectRatioDenominator
properties.description: Returns the denominator of the pixel aspect ratio (numerator:denominator). (Read Only).

properties.name: pixelAspectRatioNumerator
properties.description: Returns the numerator of the pixel aspect ratio (numerator:denominator). (Read Only).

properties.name: sRGB
properties.description: Whether the imported clip contains sRGB color data (Read Only).

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the images in the video clip in pixels. (Read Only).

properties.name: GetAudioChannelCount
properties.description: Returns the number of channels in the audio track. For example, if the audio track is a stereo track

properties.name: GetAudioLanguage
properties.description: Gets the language of the video clip’s audio tracks, if the audio tracks have an assigned language.

properties.name: GetAudioSampleRate
properties.description: Get the audio track sampling rate in hertz (Hz).

properties.name: Destroy
properties.description: Removes a GameObject, component, or asset.

properties.name: DestroyImmediate
properties.description: Destroys the specified object immediately. Use with caution and in Edit mode only.

properties.name: DontDestroyOnLoad
properties.description: Do not destroy the target Object when loading a new Scene.

properties.name: FindAnyObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves any active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindFirstObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves the first active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindObjectsByType
properties.description: Retrieves a list of all loaded objects of Type type.

properties.name: Instantiate
properties.description: Clones the object original and returns the clone.
